trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSE110_01184_SEQ_00<tab>Slafborn's brow is clouded with worry and the forecast calls for rain─unless you can save the day.

TEXT_GAIUSE110_01184_SEQ_01<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Slafborn in Revenant's Toll.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.
TEXT_GAIUSE110_01184_SEQ_02<tab>You and other intrepid adventurers return from the guildhest, tired but triumphant. Report the happy news to Slafborn.

TEXT_GAIUSE110_01184_SEQ_03<tab>Slafborn is pleased with the excitement your actions have stirred among the adventurers of Revenant's Toll. With a greater sense of fellowship comes greater strength─a fact that Slafborn, always scanning the horizon for shadows of Garlemald, is all too mindful of.

TEXT_GAIUSE110_01184_TODO_00<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Slafborn in Revenant's Toll.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_GAIUSE110_01184_TODO_01<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Slafborn in Revenant's Toll.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_GAIUSE110_01184_SLAFBORN_000_000<tab>What to do, what to do... Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Mayhap you can cut through this knot of ours.
TEXT_GAIUSE110_01184_SLAFBORN_000_001<tab>Revenant's Toll grows yet does not prosper. We draw adventurers from far and wide─or rather, the Allagan ruins draw them.

TEXT_GAIUSE110_01184_SLAFBORN_000_002<tab>So busy are they collecting tomestones and relics that they've no time for calls from the Adventurers' Guild. I fear that many who come to the Toll have no sense that we <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> a guild!
TEXT_GAIUSE110_01184_SLAFBORN_000_003<tab>You visit Rowena's establishment, do you not? That's the kind of bustle and camaraderie I'd like to see at the guild!
TEXT_GAIUSE110_01184_SLAFBORN_000_004<tab>Now, tales of your derring-do are certainly known to all. You're the genuine article, and I'd ask humbly for you to render some service to us in this matter.
TEXT_GAIUSE110_01184_SLAFBORN_000_005<tab>Might you join a guildhest, and show others the glory and the honor of these undertakings?

TEXT_GAIUSE110_01184_SLAFBORN_000_006<tab>The Ul'dahn Adventurers' Guild is currently seeking valiant volunteers to rescue a noble's gil turtle, and you are the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> to inspire others to join in this hest.

TEXT_GAIUSE110_01184_SLAFBORN_000_007<tab>...You have joined a guildhest before, yes? If not, you must seek out one of the battlewardens stationed in Bentbranch Meadows, Horizon, or Swiftperch. They will guide you through the process.

TEXT_GAIUSE110_01184_SLAFBORN_000_008<tab>At present, the Ul'dahn Adventurers' Guild is seeking volunteers to rescue a noble's gil turtle. What it would do for our organization to have someone of your standing participate!

TEXT_GAIUSE110_01184_SLAFBORN_000_009<tab>In the highly unlikely event that you have never undertaken a guildhest until now, you must travel to either Bentbranch Meadows, Horizon, or Swiftperch and speak with the battlewarden stationed there. It is their duty to assist the uninitiated.
TEXT_GAIUSE110_01184_SLAFBORN_000_020<tab>Ahhh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! The Adventurers' Guild has marked the completion of this guildhest, and honors your service.

TEXT_GAIUSE110_01184_SLAFBORN_000_021<tab>Already, the Toll buzzes with talk of the hest and the impromptu fellowship born of it. Not a few adventurers have chosen to join one themselves! Know that the Scions will hear of your success.
